statements: UPDATE UserProfile SET email = 'newemail@example.com', age = 30 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE UserProfile SET room_id = 101, lighting_settings = {'brightness': 80, 'color': 'warm'} WHERE username = 'user123';
UPDATE UserProfile SET lighting_settings = '{"brightness": 75, "color": "blue"}', age = 30 WHERE user_id = 100;
UPDATE UserProfile SET email = 'newemail@example.com', room_id = 101 WHERE username = 'john.doe';
UPDATE users SET username = 'John Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE rooms SET lighting_intensity = 80, room_name = 'Living Room' WHERE room_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', date_of_birth='1990-05-15' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE rooms SET temperature=25.5, lighting_intensity=80 WHERE room_id=2;
UPDATE users SET age = 30 WHERE username = 'John';
UPDATE lighting_settings SET brightness = 80, color = 'blue' WHERE room_id = 101;
UPDATE users SET username = 'John Doe', age = 30 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE lighting_settings SET color = 'Blue', brightness = 80 WHERE room_id = 3;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='new.email@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE room_preferences SET light_intensity=75, temperature_control=TRUE WHERE room_id=3;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'new.email@example.com', profile_image_url = 'http://example.com/image123.png' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE lighting_history SET brightness_level = 80 WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
UPDATE UserProfiles SET email='john.doe@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890', first_name='John' WHERE user_id=1
UPDATE Rooms SET temperature=25.5, light_intensity=80, room_name='Living Room' WHERE room_id=2
UPDATE UserProfiles SET email='newemail@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE LightingSettings SET brightness=75, color_temperature=4000 WHERE room_id=201;
